content.body: snek: i can just do it if you want - move the repo to tc39-transfer, and npm owner add me and i'll make sure it's added to the tc39 org

content.body: I'm not opposed to moving esvu into the TC39 org, but what would it mean? For example, who will have permissions to land patches, and who will have responsibility to act as maintainer? Maybe you could write an Admin-and-Business issue describing the plan?
